revised_title: Wave Propagation and Uniqueness in Prestressed Elastic Solids: A Study of Bi-axial Deformation
tldr: This article investigates wave propagation and uniqueness in prestressed elastic solids, specifically focusing on bi-axial deformation. The author examines the conditions for strong ellipticity in the system of equilibrium equations for the deformation and explores their implications for the displacement boundary-value problem. It is found that strong ellipticity is sufficient but not necessary for uniqueness of solutions.
